page.title: 13INDOOR GAMES ON RAASAY
page.content: INDOORS I SOMETIMES PLAY GAMES LIKE HOUSES,SHIPS ON THE BUNKBEDS, BOARD GAMES, GAMES ON PLASTICK MATS AND SOMETIMES ZOO'S. WE SOMETIMES PLAY HOUSES ON THE BUNKBEDS.WHEN WE DO WE DO IT ON THE BOTTOM BUNK AND TAKE OUR COOKER POTS PANS AND COVERS AND SOME TIMES WE TAKE THE BIG DOLLIES AS BABIES TO PLAY WITH AND SOME TIMES DRESS UP IN MUMS OLD CLOTHES AND SOME OF HER OLD SHOSE AND WE HAVE A BIG BAG OF OUR CLOTHES WE HAD WHEN WE WERE BABIES FOR OUR DOLLIES. WHEN WE PLAY SHIPS WE PLAY IT ON THE BUNK BEDS AND WE GET OUR COOKER POTS AND PANS AND NOT VERY OFTEN BUT SOMETIMES WE TAKE THE BIG DOLLS AS BABIES. WE HAVE LOTS OF BOARD GAMES.WE HAVE A BIG MAT ALL DIFFRENT GAMES ON IT.
